admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: General industry and trade sector,Compulsory pension and unemployment insurance,Other social services,Banking,Other industry
trustfund:
TF033224-COMMONWEALTH OF INDEPENDENT
            STATES -POLICY NOTES 1 (AZERBAIJAN - SAL, T,TF033139-AZERBAIJAN - STRUCTURAL
            ADJUSTMENT CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The principle objectives of the
            Structural Adjustment Credit are: (1) to open domestic
            markets to competition through trade liberalization; (2) to
            further reduce the role of the state in economic and
            commercial activities; (3) to promote the development of a
            sound banking system; and (4) to protect vulnerable groups
            from utility price increases. The SAC will be disbursed in
            two equal tranches, over a period of 9 to 10 months, upon
            completion of Board and second tranche conditions. The
            Credit will generate local currency funds, which will (1)
            provide non-inflationary financing for the budget; (2)
            increase trade liberalization, including financing
            additional imports needed, privatizing state-trading
            organizations, and eliminating export duties on cotton; and
            (3) accelerate structural reform in the areas of
            demonopolization and privatization, completing small-scale
            privatization and achieve majority private ownership of 500
            companies, and implementing the free use, sale, and mortgage
            of agricultural lands, the liquidation or restructuring of
            state enterprises, and new bankruptcy and secured
            transactions laws; (4) banking sector reform, implementing
            new accounting procedures, capital adequacy and liquidity
            standards, and restructuring plans of the four state-owned
            banks; and (5) refine the social safety net, including
            replacing food subsidies with targeted cash benefits,
            finalizing proposals on measures to mitigate effects of
            subsidy removal, and pension reform.
